aws_api_gateway_gateway_response.description: Provides an API Gateway Gateway Response for a REST API Gateway.

rest_api_id.description: The string identifier of the associated REST API.

response_type.description: The response type of the associated GatewayResponse.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the Gateway Response.

response_templates.description: A map specifying the templates used to transform the response body.

response_parameters.description: A map specifying the parameters (paths, query strings and headers
